DOC.brief_title: Proteomic Signature Breast Cancer : Correlation With Tumor Response Neo-adjuvant Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: Women age 18 year Histologically proven breast carcinoma Neoadjuvant chemotherapy anthracyclines and/or taxanes No prior chemotherapy Written inform consent Metastatic disease
